/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with bare trees, their branches reaching out into the clear blue sky. On the right side of the street, there's a building with a distinctive red and blue striped awning, adding a splash of color to the otherwise monochrome palette of the scene. On the left side, a yellow traffic cone stands out, perhaps indicating some ongoing work or a temporary obstruction on the road. The overall scene is a blend of urban architecture and natural elements, creating a harmonious balance between man-made structures and nature.
